text: Paigambara, imana rakhanaryanvara svatah tyancyapeksahi adhika hakka rakhanare aheta ani paigambaracya patn'ya imanadharakancya mata aheta ani nateva'ika, allahacya granthacya adharavara itara imanadharaka ani svadesatyaga kelelyancya tulaneta jasta hakkadara aheta. (Tathapi) tumhala apalya mitransi sad‌vyavahara karanyaci anumati ahe. Ha adesa ‘suriksata grantha’ (lauhe mahaphuja) madhye lihilela ahe
